amendatorysection.chaptername: State Uni., State Colleges, and Post. Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Nebraska Opportunity Grant Fund; created; use; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Nebraska Opportunity Grant Fund is created. Money in the fund shall include amounts transferred from the State Lottery Operation Trust Fund pursuant to section 9-812. All amounts accruing to the Nebraska Opportunity Grant Fund shall be used to carry out the Nebraska Opportunity Grant Act. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act. Any money in the Nebraska Scholarship Fund on July 1, 2010, shall be transferred to the Nebraska Opportunity Grant Fund on such date.
